document_data.mainbody: Janas was one of the Blades of the Old Man as of . He possessed a short sword and a Topsiders Crutch, given unto him by Talieth as part of his induction in , which meant he got guard duty far too often. He was afraid of Sauk, remembering what he had done to Chiganis. According to Ferluk, he was a Nar. He joined Talieths conspiracy to kill the Old Man of the Mountain a few months before his death. On the night of Tarsakh 25, he was on guard duty at the Fortress of the Old Man after distracting him with his treeclaw lizard, Perch, the ranger Berun killed him while making his way in.
